articles.author: Zachary Folk
articles.title: Biden Appears to Fall Asleep at Meeting With World Leaders - The Daily Beast
articles.description: The president closed his eyes as a representative from Tanzania spoke on the last day of his trip to Africa.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden appeared to briefly fall asleep during an international conference on railways on the last day of a trip to Africahis first while in office.
